properties.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Casper Mountain
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 11:48AM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
This is a special weather statement from the National Weather
Service Office in Riverton.

* WHAT...Snow showers. Brief moderate to heavy snow possible with
visibility reduced to around a half mile.

* WHERE...Natrona County.

* SNOWFALL TOTALS...Around 1 inch for Casper to around 3 inches
around Midwest.

* WHEN...8 PM tonight through 8 AM Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Roads will become slick and hazardous late
tonight, with winter driving conditions expected for the Monday
morning commute.

NWSheadline: Some Snow Tonight into Monday morning across Natrona County
